survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Hybrid Work Model Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees regarding their satisfaction and challenges with the hybrid work model implemented by the company.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current hybrid work model (combination of remote and in-office work)?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for better granularity in responses.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current hybrid work model (combination of remote and in-office work)?

questions.question_text: What are the main benefits you experience with the hybrid work model? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse benefits.

script.question_text: What are the main benefits you experience with the hybrid work model? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face with the hybrid work model? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Lack of access to necessary tools/equipment
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify common challenges.

script.question_text: What challenges do you face with the hybrid work model? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Lack of access to necessary tools/equipment

questions.question_text: How many days per week do you prefer to work in the office?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to gauge preferred office attendance frequency.

script.question_text: How many days per week do you prefer to work in the office?

questions.question_text: What additional support or resources would improve your experience with the hybrid work model?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather specific suggestions for improvement.

script.question_text: What additional support or resources would improve your experience with the hybrid work model?
